entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: W 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High 8.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing rain over northern sections in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
